price: Allah melapangkan rezeki bagi siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya di antara hamba-hamba-Nya dan Dia (pula) yang menyempitkan baginya.  Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Mengetahui segala sesuatu.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu min ʿibādihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
